content.html: Yeah, I think I’ll stop calling them “billionaires.” That word seems to celebrate their wealth as an accomplishment. “Oligarch” sounds good to me, since it calls attention to their power.
content.value:
Yeah, I think I’ll stop calling them “billionaires.” That word seems to celebrate their wealth as an accomplishment.

“Oligarch” sounds good to me, since it calls attention to their power.
